reviewDetails.comment: Dr Cole is amazing, a throw back to when drs cared about patients
Easy appointment and check in. Seen on time and Dr. Cole spent time explaining everything.
He is very attentive. He definitely allows you to feel that he's concerned about you and your condition. Which is very important to anyone dealing with a health matter.
Very close care for over 20 years.
Always professional, listens to issue and answers all questions!

reviewDetails.comment: Highly skilled, knowledgeable and compassionate. Solid communication skills and excellent follow up. Nursing team and office staff are all really lovely as well.  Easy access to the new office.
I am a new patient. Dr. Kosta took a lot of time with me, getting to know my medical history and who I am.  She was informative and careful.
Dr Kosta is an excellent physician; attentive thoughtful, knowledgeable and warm.  She made excellent recommendations for follow up!  I highly recommend her!
Dr. Kosta took the time to listen and answer my questions. We went over my family history, diet, lifestyle. She also wanted to evaluate further w tests instead of simply prescribing a medication.
Dr. Kosta is a caring physician with a wonderful beside manner.
